script.name: NoResourceCompleteCancel
script.description: Used for finding either complete or canceled work items for all resources (state passed in).

script_line.statement: SELECT DEFAULT_WORK_COLUMNS [lf] FROM WP_WORK_ITEM wpwork [lf] INNER JOIN WP_PROCI wpjob ON wpwork.PROCI_ID=wpjob.PROCI_ID AND wpwork.PROCI_DB=wpjob.PROCI_DB [lf] INNER JOIN WP_PROCI_NODE wpnode ON wpwork.ACTI_ID=wpnode.ACTI_ID AND wpwork.ACTI_DB=wpnode.ACTI_DB [lf] WHERE wpwork.WORK_STATE_ID=:workstate[int] [lf] ORDER BY PRIORITY ASC, ACTI_ID ASC
